name: PandasMigrationAgent
description: Automated migration from pandas 0.19.2 to 1.1.5 with comprehensive testing and backward compatibility
author: OpenHands Community
capabilities: Analyze repository for pandas usage and deprecated features
Apply migration rules with custom import mappings
Run tests in both pandas environments
sample_prompts: Migrate my repository from pandas 0.19.2 to 1.1.5
Run migration with test validation on my project
Generate a migration report for my pandas upgrade
